name: RAZ DC15000 Disposable Vape | 15,000 Puffs (Boost) | Mega HD Screen
description:
Experience the Future of Vaping with the RAZ DC15000 (Boost). Elevate your vaping journey with a powerhouse device built for flavor lovers who want intense performance. Wrapped in premium genuine leather, it feels as luxurious as it performs.

Puff Capacity
- 15,000 Puffs (Boost Mode): Unleash maximum flavor and massive vapor clouds with enhanced power.

Innovative Mega HD Screen
- E-Liquid Indicator: Know exactly how much juice is left.
- Battery Life Monitor: Track your 800mAh battery at a glance.
- Vaping Animations: High-quality fire and gear animations while you puff.

Key Features
- Pre-filled E-liquid for long-lasting use
- Nicotine Strength: 5% (50mg)
- Advanced Mesh Coil for pure, "bangin" flavor
- USB-C Fast Charging (cable not included)
- Premium transparent shell with textured leather finish

Available Flavors
- Bangin Sour Berries
- Miami Mint
- Blueberry Watermelon
- Wintergreen

description:
Experience the Future of Vaping with the RAZ DC25000 (Normal). Designed for longevity and consistency, this device is perfect for everyday vapers who want smooth, reliable draws for weeks. Wrapped in premium genuine leather for a luxury feel.

Puff Capacity

Innovative Mega HD Screen
- E-Liquid Indicator: Stay aware and avoid dry hits.
- Battery Life Monitor: Track your 800mAh battery level.

Key Features

name: Air Bar AURA XL Disposable Vape | 30,000 Puffs | Mega HD Display & PTC Chip
description:
The Ultimate Vaping Experience: Air Bar AURA XL The Air Bar AURA XL is a next-generation disposable device designed for vapers who prioritize both longevity and cutting-edge technology. Featuring a massive 27mL pre-filled e-liquid capacity and an advanced 800mAh rechargeable battery, this device is built to last through thousands of satisfying draws.

Intelligent Features & Display
Stay informed with the built-in XL HD screen, which provides real-time monitoring of your essential stats:

- E-Liquid Level Indicator: Easily track how much juice remains.

- Battery Monitoring: Know exactly when it's time to recharge via the USB-C port.

- Dynamic Animations: Interactive visuals engage every time you take a puff.

Customizable Performance
Dual Vaping Modes: Choose between Regular Mode for maximum longevity (up to 25,000 puffs) or switch to a more intense experience.

Adjustable Airflow: Fine-tune your draw from a tight MTL (mouth-to-lung) to a more open, restricted DTL (direct-to-lung) hit.

Advanced PTC Chip: Integrated technology ensures consistent flavor and performance while preventing overheating.

Product Specifications:
- Puff Count: Up to 25,000 Puffs.
- E-Liquid Capacity: 27mL.
- Nicotine Strength: 5% (50mg).
- Coil System: High-performance Mesh Coil for rich, pure flavor.
- Charging: Type-C Fast Charging.

Top Flavors in this Lineup:
- Sour Apple Ice: A tart apple blast with a cooling menthol finish.
- Miami Mint: Crisp, refreshing, and smooth spearmint.
- Blueberry Ice: Sweet mountain blueberries with a chilled exhale.

name: RAZ LTX 30,000 Puff Limited Edition Disposable | Mega HD Screen | Dual Power Modes
description:
Push the Boundaries of Vaping with the RAZ LTX 30,000 The RAZ LTX 30,000 is the pinnacle of disposable technology, engineered for vapers who never want to run out of flavor. This massive-capacity device combines a sophisticated genuine leather grip with a futuristic Mega HD Screen, providing a premium feel and total control over your vaping experience.

The Largest HD Screen in the Game
Stay ahead of the curve with a full-color, high-definition interface that does more than just show numbers. The Mega HD Screen features:

Dynamic Fire Animations: Visual flames and gears that react to every draw.

Real-Time Monitoring: Keep a precise eye on your remaining E-liquid and Battery Life.

Mode Indicators: Easily see if you are in high-power "Boost" mode or long-lasting "Normal" mode.

Advanced Performance Features
30,000 Puff Capacity: Optimized for longevity, providing weeks of use in Normal Mode.

Enhanced Boost Mode: Switch to Boost for intensified flavor and massive vapor production (approx. 18,000 puffs).

Premium Mesh Coil Technology: Dual mesh coils ensure that the last puff tastes as fresh and vibrant as the first.

USB-C Fast Charging: Minimize downtime with rapid recharging for the integrated 800mAh battery.

Specifications at a Glance:
Max Puffs: 30,000 (Normal Mode)
Nicotine Strength: 5% (50mg)
Charging: Type-C Rechargeable
Finish: Transparent shell with Genuine Leather accents
Display: Full HD Smart Screen

Featured Flavors:
Miami Mint: A chillingly smooth and refreshing mint.
Bangin Sour Berries: A sharp, tangy explosion of mixed berry goodness.
Blueberry Watermelon: A sweet, juicy fusion of summer favorites.
Watermelon Ice: Crisp watermelon with a freezing menthol finish.

name: RAZ LTX 30000 Disposable Vape | 30K Puffs | Mega HD Animated Screen | Premium Leather Grip
description:
Experience the Evolution of Vaping: The 30,000 Puff Titan
Step into the future with the longest-lasting disposable vape on the market. Engineered for those who demand performance, style, and longevity, the RAZ LTX 30000 combines a massive e-liquid reservoir with industry-leading smart technology. Wrapped in a premium genuine leather grip, it offers a luxurious feel that matches its powerful performance.

Dual-Mode Performance
Customize your hit with a simple toggle:

Normal Mode (30,000 Puffs): Optimized for consistent, smooth flavor and maximum longevity.

Boost Mode (18,000 Puffs): Activates dual mesh coils for intensified flavor and massive vapor production.

Mega HD Animated Display
The largest screen ever seen on a disposable! This high-definition interface provides more than just data; it provides an experience:

Vape Animations: Stunning HD graphics that change while you puff.

Juice & Battery Levels: Never guess your remaining levels again with precise percentage tracking.

Charging Status: Real-time feedback when plugged into a USB-C fast charger.

Key Specifications
Puff Count: Up to 30,000 Puffs (Normal Mode) / 18,000 Puffs (Boost Mode)

E-Liquid Capacity: Extra-Large Reservoir

Nicotine Strength: 5% (50mg)

Battery: 800mAh High-Density Rechargeable

Coil System: Advanced Dual Mesh Coil for superior flavor clarity

Charging: Type-C Fast Charge Port

Available Premium Flavors
Bangin Sour Berries: A sharp, tart mix of wild forest berries.

Miami Mint: A crisp, refreshing, and icy spearmint.

Blueberry Watermelon: The perfect balance of sweet summer fruits.

Wintergreen: A bold, cool blast of classic wintergreen freshness.

name: RAZ DC25000 Disposable Vape | 15,000 Puffs (Boost Mode) | Mega HD Screen | Genuine Leather Grip
description:
Unlock Maximum Power with the RAZ DC25000 Boost Edition The RAZ DC25000 is a premium, high-performance disposable vape designed for those who refuse to compromise on flavor intensity. Featuring a luxurious genuine leather wrap and a transparent outer shell, this device offers a sophisticated aesthetic alongside cutting-edge technology.

Optimized for 15,000 Puffs of Pure Flavor
While this device can reach 25,000 puffs in Regular Mode, the Boost Mode is where it truly shines. By switching to Boost (24W), the device activates its enhanced dual-core technology to deliver:

Rich Flavor: 15,000 puffs of intensified, bold taste.

Dense Vapor: Maximum cloud production for a satisfying hit every time.

Advanced Mesh Coils: Integrated 1.0Ω mesh coil technology ensures a smooth and consistent draw.

Mega HD Smart Screen
Stay informed with the industry-leading 1.77-inch HD display. This interactive screen provides real-time updates and stylish visuals, including:

E-Liquid Level Indicator: Know exactly when your 16mL reservoir is running low.

Battery Life Monitor: Track the 800mAh battery for timely recharging via USB-C.

Dynamic Animations: High-quality graphics like fire and gear animations that activate as you vape.

Key Specifications
Puff Count: 15,000 Puffs (Boost Mode) / 25,000 Puffs (Regular Mode).

Nicotine Strength: 5% (50mg) salt nicotine for a perfect throat hit.

Modes: One-click toggle between Light and Dark display modes.

Airflow: Stepless adjustable airflow control on the bottom of the device.

Battery: 800mAh rechargeable (USB-C port).

Popular Flavors Shown:
Bangin Sour Berries: A sharp, tangy berry explosion.

Miami Mint: A crisp, tropical-inspired cool mint.

Blueberry Watermelon: A juicy, sweet fruit fusion.

name: RAZ DC25000 / LTX Edition Disposable Vape (15,000–25,000 Puffs)
description:
The Ultimate Luxury Vaping Experience: RAZ DC25000 Redefine your vaping journey with the RAZ DC25000, a high-performance disposable that merges cutting-edge technology with premium design. Encased in a genuine leather-wrapped grip and a transparent protective shell, this device feels as good as it performs.

Dual Vaping Modes for Precision Control
Toggle between two distinct power settings with a single click to match your mood:

Boost Mode (15,000 Puffs): Operates at 24 watts for intensified flavor and massive vapor clouds.

Regular Mode (25,000 Puffs): Operates at 12 watts for a smoother, consistent draw that lasts for weeks.

Industry-Leading Mega HD Screen
Stay fully informed with the 1.77-inch Mega HD smart screen, the largest in its class. The vibrant interface includes:

E-Liquid & Battery Indicators: Precise percentage tracking so you never run out unexpectedly.

Vaping Animations: Interactive "Fire" and "Gear" animations that play while you draw.

Display Customization: Choose between Light and Dark modes to suit your environment.

Key Performance Features
Advanced Mesh Coils: Features temperature-controlled dual-mesh technology for pure flavor and zero burnt hits.

Adjustable Airflow: A stepless airflow control valve on the base allows you to fine-tune your draw from a tight MTL to a loose DTL.

High-Capacity Power: Powered by an 800mAh battery with USB-C fast charging.

5% (50mg) Nicotine Strength: Delivers a satisfying, smooth throat hit with every puff.

name: Cali Bars 2K Disposable Vape (2,000 Puffs)
description:
Pure Simplicity with Cali Bars 2K The Cali Bars 2K is a cult favorite known for its sleek, "stick-style" design and ultra-reliable performance. Perfect for vapers who want a consistent, pocket-friendly device without the need for charging or complicated screens, it delivers the signature "California Grown" flavor experience in a compact form.

Reliable Daily Performance
Designed for ease of use, the Cali Bars 2K is ready to go right out of the box:

2,000 Puffs: A high-capacity reservoir and optimized battery provide roughly 2,000 smooth hits.

Compact "Stick" Design: Slim enough to fit in any pocket or small bag, making it the ideal travel companion.

No Maintenance Required: No charging ports, no buttons, and no refills—simply vape and dispose of when finished.

Key Features
Puff Count: Approximately 2,000 Puffs.

E-Liquid Capacity: 5ml of premium nicotine salt.

Nicotine Strength: 5% (50mg) for a strong, satisfying hit.

Battery: Integrated pre-charged battery designed to last the full duration of the e-liquid.

Coil: Quality mesh/wire coil for instant vapor production.

Best-Selling Flavors
Blue Razz: A sweet and tart blue raspberry classic.

Watermelon Ice: Juicy watermelon with a refreshing menthol finish.

Strawberry Ice: Sweet vine-ripened strawberries with a cool exhale.

Sweet Mint: A crisp, clean, and icy mint flavor.
